name: afastidioushat
text: Barry is a fish with issues.

name: doctorother
text: He has a complicated life, is all.

name: afastidioushat
text: That's exactly what he wants you to believe.

name: thatskotkid
text: ...fissues?

name: luckypyjamas
text: i was totally going to..

name: ovenface
text: ....go bake myself a birthday cake!

name: luckypyjamas
text:
well i had meant, i was going to say "fissues" but somebody beat me to it

which is good and bad, i suppose. i missed out on the glory of coming up with it first, but yet it's gratifying to know that i'm not the only one with..

fissues...

name: farqussus
text: A comment left by farqussus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Robot_Satan, Doc_Rostov, stormagnet)

name: ovenface
text:
....are kind of depressing. :(

let's write a novel someday.

name: shutup_shutup
text: I cannot stop laughing at this.  It is a problem I enjoy.

name: kenyot
text: A comment left by kenyot was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by JTTuba, robbingdog, Doc_Rostov, fortunagolde)

name: tekende
text: I don't think so, Tim.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: tek, (it cool i call you tek?) you are in much love with this 'meme'.

name: tekende
text: No one really says this anymore, you know?

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
i just had all this soup, you know?

(yes, i know what you mean.)

name: apocowarg
text: Karl Pilkington has got a head like a fucking orange.

name: deusoma
text: ...boned?

name: drycup
text: Yeah sure he's got issues, but the fella ain't come from circumstances.

name: zem
text: He's a friendly guy but he never stops complaining.

name: jamers
text: But he compensates with Guinness, so it's all good.

name: epicurus
text: The way Beef is saying "was this before or after Janeane finally called" is so perfect. That is exactly the kind of thing you say to someone's boring story. I have met a guy like Barry but without the beer, and it was all I could do not to kill him.

name: cdl146
text: Yeah, I wouldn't tolerate a guy like Barry for five minutes... unless he had plenty of Guinness to spare. Stuff's expensive, and my time is basically worthless.

name: ibetso
text: You guys are being really harsh about Barry. Maybe you wouldn't like to hear Barry talk about his marraige, but this is Beef. He probably asked all the leading questions and genuinely wants to know whether it was "before or after Janeane finally called" 'cos he's got mad empathy skillz.

name: rowboat
text: 70% of all people who I've ever worked with are basically Barry. They can be annoying, but when you learn how to listen to them they can almost be a comfort. And yeah, especially if they're packin' stout.

name: invidious
text: When you're getting free Guinness you drag the conversation out as long as possible.

name: honesttom
text: I always end up stuck with people like Barry. You can't get rid of them. Even saying "fuck off" doesn't work.

name: zapatos
text: You try to sleep with their ex's, or their family.

name: zapatos
text: Wait sorry, "I" do that.  You obviously don't, because you get stuck with them.  I apologize.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: What'd you expect? He's a largemouth bass.

name: tttt
text: Barry should drink Bass

name: rowboat
text: I hate that, but how could I not chubby it? I must.

name: narcolepticdog
text: Fish know Guiness is a superior brew.

name: shirt145
text: Wouldn't that be cannibalism?

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Barry carps overly much for a freshwater fish.

name: dovey
text: Oh man, I completely forgot these strips existed. Does anybody else notice he talks exactly like Beef?

name: coolbreeze3
text: Barry Bass is the fish version of Beef. :O

name: charchar
text:
Sooo, fish = beef?
What a difference a capital letter makes.

name: heccibiggs
text: Weirdass concept.

name: shutup_shutup
text: This is false.  Beef don't want to put sauce in your ears.  Barry Bass is all about putting sauce in your ears.

name: theguitarhero
text: Tartar sauce!

name: tbtabby
text: I want to sue that alt text for false advertising.

name: electra310
text:
Every one-shot character's girlfriend is named Janeanne. The ill-fated Carl had one as well. Perhaps his WWII-era condom is in some obscure way responsible for the fecundity of Barry's partner.

But probably not, because fish do not, in general, have phalluses.

name: vreeeee
text: I think they're the same Janeane

name: greenkoolayd
text: Janeane Garofalo

name: divot
text: You should never go fishing on Black Lake when the moon is full.

name: spenham
text: Easy now, fuzzy little Man-peach.

name: heccibiggs
text: You'll get Guinness or Bailey's. Either way, it's some kind of Irish alcoholic beverage... but at a price

name: relaxing
text: FULL FRONTAL MANGINA

name: heccibiggs
text: I really don't remember writing that comment, so getting this little gem in my inbox was quite something.

name: relaxing
text: I only started watching A Mighty Boosh last week, so seeing this thread was a real pleasure.

name: heccibiggs
text: The, The Mighty Boosh.

name: relaxing
text: I also download videos of Are You Getting Served, Faulty Towers, and Coronation Road.

name: relaxing
text: (That is the extent of my knowledge of British television.)

name: relaxing
text: Wait, they used to show East Enders on local TV when I was younger.  Maybe they still do.

name: sex_bicycle
text:
coronation street? and lame lol thats an old ladys show why would you go to the hassle of downloading it?

eastenders is cool, everyone of those characters should be on anti-depressents

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
i know you're making the mistakes on purpose, but people might not know you're talking about 'being' served and those 'fawlty' towers. so i have to hint at it in this comment.

dishonorable mention: ab-fab.

name: soup_alex
text: "Coronation Road", that is just too much.

name: heccibiggs
text:
OH MY GOD I literally just got the joke that relaxing was making. Because he made a mistake in his original mention of a British show ("A Mighty Boosh", how silly), he chose to make jokes in the names of other British shows he'd heard of, thus continuing the theme.

And all this time I thought he was just retarded.

name: relaxing
text: In fairness, this doesn't rule out a mental handicap on my part.

name: landowmpg
text: That's about as close as you can get to Bailey's without gettin' your eyes wet.

name: snowman
text: Just started watching some of The Mighty Boosh on youtube.  It looks brilliant, I wonder if it's on DVD...

name: heccibiggs
text: It is, at least 3 seasons.

name: snowman
text:
Perhaps I can netflix it. I wonder if it's actually for sale in stores over here, I think I'm confident enough that I can actually buy it...

Are you a fan?

name: relaxing
text: I've looked into it, and the DVDs aren't formatted for the US (if that is where 'over here' is.)  Unless you have a fancy PAL-converting regionless DVD player

name: divot
text:
I can watch region 2 DVDs on my laptop using VLC Player, but I know watching things on the computer isn't the best solution for most people. videohelp.com has a lot of DVD player hacks, too, for making North American (and, I'm assuming, ones from other regions as well) DVD players regionless.

(I clearly spend too much time watching TV.)

name: heccibiggs
text: Actually, I'm not really a massive fan at all. I mean, I've watched a couple of episodes and I enjoyed them, but so many people I know are just damn crazy about it (like we all are with Achewood, I guess), and I'm a bit like, uhhh what's the huge deal guys.

name: divot
text: I definitely loved the first two series, but the third just felt like they ran out of ideas and it kind of sucked a lot. And now they're, like, making a movie and recording an album or something, which makes me want to tell them to just go away for a while.

name: heccibiggs
text: I would like to update this. I am now a big, BIG fan of The Mighty Boosh. My flatmate at uni got me into it. I can pretty much quote any episode, or anything from the DVD extra features or commentaries. I shit you not. Obsessive McGee.

name: relaxing
text: I think we are all here Obsessives McGee.

name: soupkaty
text: one show you didn't list - The Young Ones.

name: soupkaty
text: oh hell and damn how did i forget about doctor who

name: spenham
text: Has anyone noticed that Barry and Beef have the same text style? Barry does seem like a depressed bass, if I know anything about mental disorders in fish.

name: jabroniville
text: This is rated much lower than I think it deserves. The fact that they immediately flow into casual conversation makes it funnier for some reason.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: this is not Days of Thunder.

name: redion
text: i totally heard "hi i'm barry" in a "hi. i'm old gregg" sort of way.

name: relaxing
text: Yeah we're having that same discussion above like a year ago. Come join us!

name: skyisfalling
text:
Barry's "No kidding" doesn't have a question mark.
Guiness is Beef's favourite beer.
Of course it is, and Barry knows why
